**Title {English & French}**  
Ergonomic Chairs
Chaises ergonomiques

**Reference Number**  
cb-6950-869611

**Publication Date**

**Tender Closing Date & Time**  
2023-07-19T14:00:00

**Summary of Opportunity**  

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of office chairs at their location in Burnaby, British Columbia.

**Procurement Details**

Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
Regions of Opportunity: Canada
Regions of Delivery: Burnaby, British Columbia

**Attachments**

The following documents are available:
• Amendment 1 
• Amendment 2
• Request for Proposal (RFP)
• Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

**Contact Information**

For any queries or concerns regarding this tender opportunity, please contact:
Catherine Clairoux
Email: catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca
Phone: (343) 596-9265

**Attachments Link**

The attachments are available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6950/2024-00205-amendment-001.pdf
